name: Out Of Stock
description:
Coming soon..

You Quitted your job as a Warehouse Associate of the company Zarya creations two years ago

And today your old Boss invited you to visit your old workplace for an unknown reason

you went to check it out since you don't have anything better to do 

But things didn't go really well..

Demo Coming soon

Like really soon

Controls:

WASD-Move

Ctrl-Crouch

Shift-Run

Tab-Inventory

E-interact

Esc-Pause Menu
